thread.title: Ruben van der Velde
thread.title_full: GameSeek reviewed by Ruben van der Velde

author: Ruben van der Velde
title: Ruben van der Velde
text: Any one who wants to buy a game, buy it at gameseek.co.uk. I'm not living in the UK and they sent me an e-mail that the delivery could take 16-20 workdays. Actually it only took about 9 workdays. Like I said, buy at gameseek. Ist fast, they've nice delivery and it's, for me, the cheapest way to get my games. An easy five star rating for me guys!!
